metadata.title: CVE-2021-28657 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A carefully crafted or corrupt file may trigger an infinite loop in Tika'sMP3Parser up to and including Tika 1.25. Apache Tika users should upgradeto 1.26 or later.

criterions.comment: tika: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
